com.mumfrey.liteloader.permissions

Class Permission

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mumfrey.liteloader.permissions.Permission

  • public class Permission
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which represents a permission node
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Permission()
      Create a new root node
      Permission(java.lang.String permissionName)
      Create a new child node with the specified name
      Permission(java.lang.String permissionName, boolean value)
      Create a new child node with the specified name and value

      Permission setPermission(java.lang.String name, boolean value)
      Set the specified permission to the specified value
      Permission setPermissionAndValue(java.lang.String name, boolean value)
      Sets a permission and also explicitly sets the permission value, this allows negated permissions to be set
      void setValue(boolean newValue)
      Set the value of this permission node
